title: Irish Whiskey | Singer-Songwriter Gareth Dunlop | What's The Greatest TV Intro Song?
itunes:title: Irish Whiskey | Singer-Songwriter Gareth Dunlop | What's The Greatest TV Intro Song?
description:
On St. Patrick's Day, Irish singer-songwriter & whiskey aficionado Gareth Dunlop joins the show to taste Redbreast 12 year, Green Spot, Method and Madness and Jameson Black Barrel. 

Gareth just released a new single with touching video starring his son & daughter, "Look Back Smiling" (press release / private album stream). With it, he announced the album Animal & tour with Foy Vance (Ed Sheeran's Gingerbread Man Records) - following his previous tours with Van Morrison, Jeff Beck, Snow Patrol and James Morrison.

Tipped as "one to watch" by BBC, you may have heard Gareth's music in hit shows Nashville, Lucifer, This Is Us, Bones and beyond. His songwriting credits also include Tim McGraw & Faith Hill, T.I. and John Oates.

With it, he announced the album Animal & tour with Foy Vance (Ed Sheeran's Gingerbread Man Records) - following his previous tours with Van Morrison, Jeff Beck, Snow Patrol and James Morrison.

Tipped as "one to watch" by BBC, you may have heard Gareth's music in hit shows Nashville, Lucifer, This Is Us, Bones and beyond. His songwriting credits also include Tim McGraw & Faith Hill, T.I. and John Oates.
